title: Best Bike Chain Lubes: How to make your bike faster, quieter & smoother
content:
There are few components on your bike that work as hard as your chain does. It doesn’t take much effort to keep a chain clean and lubricated, but choosing the right chain lube can be a little confusing. Wax or oil? Wet or dry? Is $10 chain lube as good as the $30 bottle? It […]

The post Best Bike Chain Lubes: How to make your bike faster, quieter & smoother appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Molly Hurford
